content.p: Attend our workshops to help you find source vacancies for postgraduate study and graduate jobs. They will also cover the recruitment and selection process for a postgraduate course, internship or graduate job. You can access our online courses instead. How to write an effective application form How to prepare for an assessment centre How to build a great CV and covering letter telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
